tr.td: The person that asserted or informed about the addiction.

description.value: A record of a patient's known, suspected or resolved addiction. This represents the addiction condition, not an addiction-related event or observation.

short.value: The clinical status of the addiction - whether it is active, resolved...
The verification status of the addiction - whether it is suspected, confirmed, etc.
The category of addiction, e.g. gaming, social, or substance addiction...
The person that has/had the addiction
The time, event or period when the addiction started. If it's a period, this is the period in which the addiction appeared, not how long the addiction lasted.
The time, event or period when the addiction ended.
The date when the addiction was first recorded
The person that first recorded the addiction
The person that asserted or informed about the addiction.
